name: Rooftop Motorbike Rider - Furious Stunts Driving
name_original: Rooftop Motorbike Rider - Furious Stunts Driving
description:
Do you love motorcycle games? Here you can perform bike stunts as a real superhero on the city Rooftop. Riders can do big jumps, mid-air ramps on modern city tracks by playing Moto GP stunt game. In Ultimate Stunt racing there are Offroad tracks that are dangerous to climb. The rooftop tracks high up in the sky make it thrilling for crazy bike rider. Extreme Rooftop Motorbike Rider Simulator is motorbike riding and action game in which moto bike driver will show stunt in thrilling rooftop and road riding missions.

Tighten your seat belt and speed through dangerous rooftop tracks. Ride moto bike on ramps to jump over buildings rooftops and reach the final check point. Dare to live life on the edge for an amazing stunt drift riding adventure on grand city roads and prove that you are the real trail bike racer. Moto GP stunt racing game is a challenge for bike lovers in difficult stunt area. Your goal is in this thrilling bike stunt simulator to drive your Furious bike on high speed and perform some tricky and dangerous jumps. Start the fun tracks now and Do tightened circle stunts and make roof flip to prove that you are a Xtreme bike stunt legend.

Show furious stunts as extreme motorcycle rider on city roads. Drive from skyscrapers building to building by high jump in the air through ramps. For smooth driving city traffic rush is banned so that you can get real racing fever with the best sports bike. Take control of both heavy bike and dirt bike by carefully handling the fast racing speed with perfect balance. Prove your super extreme bike stunt riding skills by playing furious stunt simulator game of 2017.

Features of Furious City Motorbike Rider:  
- Amazing bird’s eye view of the beautiful city
- Stunning 3D graphics  with smooth and realistic bike handling
- Realistic game sounds
- Tilt steering
- Different bikes to choose from
- Simulator like controls
- Easy to learn and drive
- Dangerous hilly environment
